body_content: PL25008aNVd: IMO MSC 110 5 -Papers 5 15, 5 16, 5 17, 5 18, 5 21 - To Review Date: 2025-05-27 To: Safe Digital Transformation Panel Chair and Members Subject: PL25008aNVd: IMO MSC 110 5 - Papers 5 15, 5 16, 5 17, 5 18, 5 21 - To Review Dear all, 1. Reference is made to PL25008aILf: IMO MSC 110 5 - Papers 5 15, 5 16, 5 17, 5 18, 5 21 - To Review 2. With reference to item 4, please note the following comments: MSC 110-5-15 is supported. MSC 110-5-16 is partly supported. Support the suggested definition of override to distinguish from other handover situations Support further discussions around the interim certificate() for the MASS and ROC Do not support the deletion of the requirement that the preliminary design should be approved before the interim certificates are given MSC 110-5-17 is not supported as it reopen items already discussed and concluded. MSC 110-5-18 is supported. MSC 110-5-21 is not supported general cyber focused review of the MASS code as suggested in MSC 110 5 7 is preferred and cyber security for MASS should also be included in MSC 110 7 addressing goal-based Rules for cyber security in general MSC 110-5-20 is noted. Best regards Odd Magne Nesv√•g DNV IACS Safe Digital Transformation Panel Member This -mail and any attachments thereto may contain confidential information and or information protected by intellectual property rights for the exclusive attention of the intended addressees named above. If you have received this transmission in error, please immediately notify the sender by return -mail and delete this message and its attachments. Unauthorized use, copying or further full or partial distribution of this -mail or its contents is prohibited.

analysis_result.summary: Panel member provides detailed comments on IMO MSC 110 papers, supporting some papers while not supporting others, with specific feedback on MASS code requirements.
